title: Cardi B flaunts hourglass figure in a daring thong bikini before planting a kiss on husband Offset
text:
They embarked on a tropical vacation to celebrate her 27th birthday.

And Cardi B looked completely enamored with her husband Offset as she jumped into his arms and displayed her incredible curves while wearing a zebra print thong bikini for a romantic moment in the ocean.

The Bodak Yellow rapper flaunted her impressive form while showing off an ample amount of artwork tattooed onto her back and thigh as she hit the waters with her main man.

Love is in the air: Cardi B looked completely enamored with her husband Offset as she jumped into his arms and displayed her incredible curves while wearing a zebra print thong bikini for a romantic moment in the ocean

Cardi gave off mermaid vibes in the steamy shoot as her long, curly brown hair cascaded down her back and nearly touched the water.

She could barely contain her ample assets in the tiny two piece, which was held together with intricate straps across her rib cage and neck.

Making sure to stay on trend as always, she wrapped a matching black-and-white bandanna around her head.

Two if by sea: The Bodak Yellow rapper flaunted her impressive form while showing off an ample amount of artwork tattooed onto her back and thigh as she hit the waters with her main man

Offset seemed to be in a frisky mood as he helped his wife relax on the back of a water craft.

Cardi — who's real name is Belcalis Marlenis Almánzar — had another banner year after releasing her first album, Invasion of Privacy, on April 6, 2018.

The Bronx-born beauty earned the Best Rap Album Grammy Award for her debut record, with Rolling Stone and Time listing it as number one for the year.

Not so secret: Offset seemed to be in a frisky mood as he helped his wife relax on the back of a water craft

Just days after releasing the tracks, Cardi took to the Saturday Night Live stage to reveal she was pregnant with her first child, a daughter who was born in July and named Kulture Kiari Cephu.

As if her schedule wasn't enough, she took on a starring role alongside Jennifer Lopez in the true crime story of a team of strippers who take on Wall Street execs in the '90s called Hustlers.

She's not slowing down any time soon and recently announced on Instagram that new music in the works for 2020 with an album called Tiger Woods.
